meanings.definition: A person of Mexican descent living in the United States.
meanings.sent1: The Chicano was proud of his heritage.
meanings.sent2: Many Chicanos celebrate Cinco de Mayo.
meanings.sent3: The Chicano joked that he had hot sauce in his veins.
meanings.sent4: She described him as a Chicano warrior fighting for equality.
meanings.sent5: The Chicano community is vibrant and diverse.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to Mexican Americans.
meanings.sent1: She wore a chicano dress to the fiesta.
meanings.sent2: The mural depicted chicano culture beautifully.
meanings.sent3: His chicano style stood out at the party.
meanings.sent4: The chicano influence could be seen in the music.
meanings.sent5: The restaurant served delicious chicano cuisine.
